name: Kanehshon Sterling Silver Earrings
description:
I made these gorgeous earrings in the usual Japanese style that I love so much! They are carnations that have zigzag petals. They are on hoops and have been sawpierced out of Sterling Silver. The flower measures approx 28mm/ 1.10 inches in diameter.They have a beautiful movement when they are worn. I know you will love these!

These will be shipped within 3 days of receiving payment.

Shipping Options:
International: Australia Post Airmail (approx 5-7 days for USA, 5 days for the UK and 10 days for Canada & approx.7-10 days for Europe; please check with me for other destinations)

Australia: Items will be sent by Express Post (overnight)

©Ceeb Wassermann, 2011. The moral rights of the designer are asserted.

name: Sterling Silver Heart Sakura Hoop Earrings
description:
Sakura earrings that have 5 tiny hearts cut out in the middle of the flower. They sit on fine hoops that are approx 20mm in diameter and swing as you move. They catch the light in the movement! Fun to wear anywhere and with anything. Hand cut from sterling silver. The hoops have also been handmade by me.

Thank you for dropping in!

These will be shipped within 3 days of receiving payment.

Shipping Options:
International: Australia Post Airmail (approx 5-7 days for USA, 5 days for the UK and 10 days for Canada & approx.7-10 days for Europe; please check with me for other destinations)

Australia: Items will be sent by Express Post (overnight)

©Ceeb Wassermann, 2011. The moral rights of the designer are asserted.

name: The Lost Ring of Aes Sidhe
description:
It has been known in old Mythology that the aes sídhe had a magical ring which was lost in our realm. They are said to live underground in the fairy mounds, across the western sea, or in an invisible world that coexists with the world of humans. This world is described in "The Book of Invasions" (recorded in the Book of Leinster) as a parallel universe in which the aos sí walk amongst the living.

The Ring of sídhe is said to have magical powers and can only “come alive” if the wearer is the “One”. Are you the "One"??

(I love "stories")

Ring #2 for RAW52. RAW52 means Ring A Week. We are challeging ourselves to make a totally new Ring every week.
sterling,rutilated quartz,oxidized,polished,bezel set.

Something a little different and un-japanese...

It stands approx 1.5"/36mm from base of shank to top of stone. The rutilated quarz measures approx 14mm x 17mm.
This one is a Size 11 (US) ; W (British)

I can make one in any size and in other stones. Contact me if you need to discuss it.
Shipping Options:
International: Airmail (approx 5-7 days for USA, 5 days for the UK and 10 days for Canada & approx.7-10 days for Europe; please check with me for other destinations)

Australia: Express Post (overnight)

©Ceeb Wassermann, 2011. The moral rights of the designer are asserted.

name: Flowers For Phil G Ring in Sterling Silver
description:
This ring was inspired by my friend Phil G, who recently passed away after a battle with leukemia. The Pearl and stones represent flower buds.

The shank is 20mm wide and light. In the center there are a bunch of buds. The Pearl is approx 10mm, the green onyx is approx 8mm and the orange cubic is approx 5mm.

I will custom make to your size. Just leave your desired size in "message to seller" upon checkout.

Will ship 3-4 working days after payment is received.

©Ceeb Wassermann, 2011. The moral rights of the designer are asserted.

Shipping Info:
For Australia: It will be shipped express post.

International: By Airmail and should take between 5-7 working days and approx 14 to Canada.

name: Sterling Silver Sakura Pendant No. 3
description:
Another selection in the Sakura story. This is a flat version. Approx 30mm in diameter. I can make this in gold, brass or copper. Contact me if you want to customize it.

Here's a little bit about Sakuras or Cherry Blossoms:
In Japan cherry blossoms also symbolize clouds due to their nature of blooming en masse, besides being an enduring metaphor for the ephemeral nature of life, an aspect of Japanese cultural tradition that is often associated with Buddhistic influence, and which is embodied in the concept of mono no aware. The transience of the blossoms, the extreme beauty and quick death, has often been associated with mortality; for this reason, cherry blossoms are richly symbolic, and have been utilized often in Japanese art, manga, anime, and film, as well as at musical performances for ambient effect. There is at least one popular folk song, originally meant for the shakuhachi (bamboo flute), titled "Sakura", and several pop songs.

Shipping Options:
International: if you do not specify, then I will send Airmail (approx 5-7 days for USA, 5 days for the UK and 10 days for Canada & approx.7-10 days for Europe; please check with me for other destinations)

Australia: Items will be sent by Express Post (overnight)
